code: # Enable repository from pecanproject options(repos = c(   pecanproject = 'https://pecanproject.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org')) # Download and install PEcAn.ED2 in R install.packages('PEcAn.ED2') library(remotes) install_github('pecanproject/pecan',  subdir = "models/ed")

what: Use semi-analytic solution to accelerate model spinup — SAS.ED2
title: Use semi-analytic solution to accelerate model spinup — SAS.ED2
text: functions approximates landscape equilibrium steady state vegetation soil pools using successional trajectory single patch modeled disturbance prescribed disturbance rates runs (Xia et al. 2012 GMD 5:1259-1271).

title: Use semi-analytic solution to accelerate model spinup — SAS.ED2
code: SAS.ED2(   dir.analy,   dir.histo,   outdir,   lat,   lon,   blckyr,   prefix,   treefall,   param.args = SAS.ED2.param.Args(),   sufx = "g01.h5" )

title: Use semi-analytic solution to accelerate model spinup — SAS.ED2
text: dir.analy Location ED2 analysis files; expects monthly yearly output dir.histo Location ED2 history files (vars analy); expects monthly outdir Location write SAS .css & .pss files lat site latitude; used file naming lon site longitude; used file naming blckyr Number years patch ages (aka blocks) prefix ED2 -E- output file prefix treefall Value used TREEFALL_DISTURBANCE_RATE ED2IN full runs (disturbance ) param.args ED2 parameter arguments (mostly soil biogeochem) sufx ED2 file suffix; used constructing file names(default "g01.h5)

title: Use semi-analytic solution to accelerate model spinup — SAS.ED2
text: Christine Rollinson, modified original Jaclyn Hatala-Matthes (2/18/14) 2014 Feb: Original ED SAS solution Script PalEON modeling HIPS sites (Matthes) 2015 Aug: Modifications greater site flexibility & updated ED 2016 Jan: Adaptation regional-scale runs (single-cells run independently, executed batches) 2018 Jul: Conversion function, Christine Rollinson July 2018

what: sets parameters and defaults for the ED2 semi-analytical spin-up — SAS.ED2.param.Args
title: sets parameters and defaults for the ED2 semi-analytical spin-up — SAS.ED2.param.Args
text: sets parameters defaults ED2 semi-analytical spin-

title: sets parameters and defaults for the ED2 semi-analytical spin-up — SAS.ED2.param.Args
code: SAS.ED2.param.Args(   decomp_scheme = 2,   kh_active_depth = -0.2,   decay_rate_fsc = 11,   decay_rate_stsc = 4.5,   decay_rate_ssc = 0.2,   Lc = 0.049787,   c2n_slow = 10,   c2n_structural = 150,   r_stsc = 0.3,   rh_decay_low = 0.24,   rh_decay_high = 0.6,   rh_low_temp = 18 + 273.15,   rh_high_temp = 45 + 273.15,   rh_decay_dry = 12,   rh_decay_wet = 36,   rh_dry_smoist = 0.48,   rh_wet_smoist = 0.98,   resp_opt_water = 0.8938,   resp_water_below_opt = 5.0786,   resp_water_above_opt = 4.5139,   resp_temperature_increase = 0.0757,   rh_lloyd_1 = 308.56,   rh_lloyd_2 = 1/56.02,   rh_lloyd_3 = 227.15,   yrs.met = 30,   sm_fire = 0,   fire_intensity = 0,   slxsand = 0.33,   slxclay = 0.33 )

title: sets parameters and defaults for the ED2 semi-analytical spin-up — SAS.ED2.param.Args
text: decomp_scheme Decomposition scheme specified ED2IN kh_active_depth Depth threshold averaging soil moisture temperature decay_rate_fsc Fast soil carbon decay rate decay_rate_stsc Structural soil carbon decay rate decay_rate_ssc Slow soil carbon decay rate Lc Used compute nitrogen immpobilzation factor; ED default 0.049787 (soil_respiration.f90) c2n_slow Carbon Nitrogen ratio, slow pool; ED Default 10.0 c2n_structural Carbon Nitrogen ratio, structural pool. ED default 150.0 r_stsc Decomp param rh_decay_low Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 0.24 rh_decay_high Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 0.60 rh_low_temp Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 291 rh_high_temp Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 318.15 rh_decay_dry Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 12.0 rh_decay_wet Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 36.0 rh_dry_smoist Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 0.48 rh_wet_smoist Param used ED-1/CENTURY decomp schemes; ED default = 0.98 resp_opt_water Param used decomp schemes 0 & 3, ED default = 0.8938 resp_water_below_opt Param used decomp schemes 0 & 3, ED default = 5.0786 resp_water_above_opt Param used decomp schemes 0 & 3, ED default = 4.5139 resp_temperature_increase Param used decomp schemes 0 & 3, ED default = 0.0757 rh_lloyd_1 Param used decomp schemes 1 & 4 (Lloyd & Taylor 1994); ED default = 308.56 rh_lloyd_2 Param used decomp schemes 1 & 4 (Lloyd & Taylor 1994); ED default = 1/56.02 rh_lloyd_3 Param used decomp schemes 1 & 4 (Lloyd & Taylor 1994); ED default = 227.15 yrs.met Number years cycled model spinup part 1 sm_fire Value used SM_FIRE INCLUDE_FIRE=2; defaults 0 (fire ) fire_intensity Value used FIRE_PARAMTER; defaults 0 (fire ) slxsand Soil percent sand; used calculate expected fire return interval slxclay Soil percent clay; used calculate expected fire return interval

title: Modify an ED2IN object — modify_ed2in
text: convenience function modifying ed2in list object. Arguments passed caps assumed ED2IN namelist parameters inserted directly ed2in list objects. Lowercase arguments defined explicitly (see "Parameters"), match explicit arguments ignored warning. lowercase arguments come additional validity checks, recommended modifying ED2IN file directly via uppercase arguments. lowercase arguments, default (NULL) means use whatever currently input ed2in.

title: Modify an ED2IN object — modify_ed2in
code: modify_ed2in(   ed2in,   ...,   veg_prefix = NULL,   latitude = NULL,   longitude = NULL,   met_driver = NULL,   start_date = NULL,   end_date = NULL,   EDI_path = NULL,   output_types = NULL,   output_dir = NULL,   run_dir = NULL,   runtype = NULL,   run_name = NULL,   include_these_pft = NULL,   pecan_defaults = FALSE,   add_if_missing = FALSE,   check_paths = TRUE,   .dots = list() )

title: Modify an ED2IN object — modify_ed2in
text: ed2in list modify ... Namelist arguments (see Description Details) veg_prefix Vegetation file prefix (SFILIN). lat lon part prefix, latitude Run latitude coordinate. veg_prefix also provided, pass read_ed_veg, otherwise set ED2IN directly. omitted lat lon already part veg_prefix. longitude Run longitude coordinate. veg_prefix also provided, pass read_ed_veg, otherwise set ED2IN directly. omitted lat lon already part veg_prefix. met_driver Path filename met driver header (ED_MET_DRIVER_DB) start_date Run start date (IMONTHA, IDATEA, IYEARA, ITIMEA) end_date Run end date (IMONTHZ, IDATEZ, IYEARZ ITIMEZ) EDI_path Path EDI directory, often VEG_DATABASE THSUMS_DATABASE files. output_types Character vector output types (see Details) output_dir Output directory, FFILOUT (analysis) SFILOUT (history) files run_dir Directory store run-related config files (e.g. config.xml). runtype ED initialization mode; either "INITIAL" "HISTORY" run_name Give run informative name/description. Sets ED2IN EXPNME tag. (default NULL) include_these_pft Numeric vector describing PFTs include ED. Note addition PFTs specified config.xml – regardless set , PFTs included, want use PFTs defined config.xml, set numeric(0). default (NULL) means use whatever already current ED2IN file, usually (1-17) ED's PFTs. pecan_defaults Logical. TRUE, set common ED2IN defaults. add_if_missing Logical. TRUE, -caps arguments found existing ed2in list added end.  Default = FALSE. check_paths Logical. TRUE (default), parameters expect files, check files exist throw error . .dots list ... arguments.

title: Modify an ED2IN object — modify_ed2in
text: Modified ed2in list object. See read_ed2in.

title: Modify an ED2IN object — modify_ed2in
text: Namelist arguments applied last, silently overwrite arguments set special case arguments. Namelist arguments can stored list passed via .dots argument (e.g. .dots = list(SFILIN = "/path/prefix_", ...)), using rlang::!!! splicing operator. provided, spliced together, ... taking precedence. output_types, select one following: "fast" – Fast analysis; mostly polygon-level averages (IFOUTPUT) "daily – Daily means (one file per day) (IDOUTPUT) "monthly" – Monthly means (one file per month) (IMOUTPUT) "monthly_diurnal" – Monthly means diurnal cycle (one file per month) (IQOUTPUT) "annual" – Annual (one file per year) (IYOUTPUT) "instant" – Instantaneous fluxes, mostly polygon-level variables, one file per year (ITOUTPUT) "restart" – Restart file HISTORY runs. (ISOUTPUT) "" – output types

title: Function for reading -E- files — read_E_files
text: function reads monthly output (-E- .h5 files) ED2, unit conversions, returns list passed put_E_values().  Cohort level variables (.e. ending "_CO") often (always?) per-plant units rather per area. function converts per area using plant density patch area converting units PEcAn standards.

text: Read ED_MET_DRIVER_HEADER file list-like object can manipulated within R. Returns list file formats.

title: Read ED meteorology header file — read_ed_metheader
Read ED meteorology header file — read_ed_metheader
text: filename File name (including path) met driver header file, character check Logical, whether check file correctness (default = TRUE) check_files Logical. TRUE, perform basic diagnostics met files well.

title: Read ED meteorology header file — read_ed_metheader
text: List ED met input parameters. See Details.

title: Read ED meteorology header file — read_ed_metheader
text: output unnamed list element corresponding single file format. file format contains following elements: path_prefix – Path prefix files nlon – Number longitude grid cells nlat – Number latitude grid cells dx – Size longitude grid cell dy – Size latitude grid cell xmin – Minimum longitude ymin – Minimum latitude variables – Data frame variables, columns described . Starred columns required writing. table left joined met_variable_description met_flag_description. variable – Variable name description – Variable description unit – Variable unit update_frequency – Update frequency (seconds) scalar values flag=4 flag – Variable flags. flag_description – Description variable flag formatting meteorology header file follows (ED GitHub Wiki):   variables third row defined follows:
code: <number of file formats>    # Repeat lines below this number of times <path and prefix of files> <nlon>, <nlat>, <dx>, <dy>, <xmin>, <ymin> <number of variables> <list of variable names> <list of update frequencies (seconds) or scalar values if flag=4> <list of variable flags>

title: Run ED singularity container — run_ed_singularity
text: systems, run Singularity properly, need bind additional paths. , pass arguments character vector singularity_args. instance:   default, base::system2 prints output console. store standard ED output variable character vector, set stdout = TRUE. redirect output variable, including GCC exceptions, use stderr = TRUE (automatically set stdout = TRUE well). Output can also redirected file via stderr = "/path//file.log".
code: bindpaths <- c("/scratch", "/data") run_ed_singularity(..., singularity_args = paste("--bind", bindpaths))

title: PEcAn.ED2 1.8.2
text: model2netcdf.ed2 longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.ED2 1.8.1
text: Fixed vignette compilation Docker build fixes

title: PEcAn.ED2 1.8.0
text: Warning messages model2netcdf.ed2() coming ncdf4::ncvar_put() now prepended variable name easier debugging (#3078) Fixed bug model2netcdf.ed2() .nc file connections closed multiple times, printing warnings (#3078) Fixed bug affecting generation job.sh runs many PFTs (#3075) Added optional process_partial argument model2netcdf.ED2() allow process existing output failed runs. write.config.xml.ED2() wasn’t using  tag settings correctly (#3080) Fixed bug plant_min_temp trait value wasn’t converted ºC K writing config file ED2 (#3110) Fixed bug read_E_files() affecting model2netcdf.ED2() resulted incorrect calculations (#3126) DDBH (change DBH time) longer extracted summarized monthly -E- files model2netcdf.ED2(). sure makes sense summarize variable across cohorts different sizes. yr yfiles arguments read_E_files() longer used simulation date extracted names .h5 files output ED2. Fixed bug dimensions output .nc file incorrect PFT missing ED2 output less full year (#3140, #3143). Added optional process_partial argument model2netcdf.ED2() allow process existing output failed Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Prior point changes tracked main CHANGELOG PEcAn repository.
